{$contentBreadcrumb} {$contentbeforeTitle}{if strlen($contentTitle) > 0 && $hasTitle}

{$contentprependTitle}{$contentTitle}{$contentappendTitle}

{/if}{$contentafterTitle}
    {$contentbeforeDetails} {$contentbeforeAuthors}{if strlen($contentAuthors) > 0 && $hasAuthors}
  • {$contentprependAuthors}{$contentAuthors}{$contentappendAuthors}
    • {/if}{$contentafterAuthors} {$contentbeforePublishdate}{if strlen($contentPublishdate) > 0 && $hasPublishdate}
  • {$contentprependPublishdate}{$contentPublishdate}{$contentappendPublishdate}
    • {/if}{$contentafterPublishdate} {$contentbeforeCategories}{if strlen($contentCategories) > 0 && $hasCategories}
  • {$contentprependCategories}{$contentCategories}{$contentappendCategories}
    • {/if}{$contentafterCategories} {$contentafterDetails}
{$contentbeforeContent}{if strlen($contentContent) > 0 && $hasContent}
{$contentprependContent}{$contentContent}{$contentappendContent}
{/if}{$contentafterContent}
{$paging}
{$contentModules}
